name: MSCRMCloneSolution
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: More information on cloning a solution can be found [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/customize/use-segmented-solutions-patches-simplify-updates#clone-a-solution)

inputs.name: uniqueName
inputs.label: Parent Solution Unique Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique name of the parent solution you want to create a patch from

inputs.name: displayName
inputs.label: Solution Display Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The display name of the cloned solution. If blank the display name of the parent base solution will be used.

inputs.name: versionNumber
inputs.label: Solution Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format:[major.minor.build.release]. The version number of the cloned solution. If blank a default version will be assigned with an incremented minor revision
